context.description: The 'About Us' page is the main brand credibility touchpoint for new and returning customers. It must communicate who we are, our mission and vision, and the trustworthiness of DoktorABC's medical and operational infrastructure.
visitors: New users evaluating DoktorABC for the first time
Returning customers seeking reassurance about our legitimacy
Users clicking through from the footer, FAQ, or press coverage
context.design_principle: The design must emphasize transparency, professionalism, and credibility — clearly showing that DoktorABC is a medically regulated, trusted, and responsible healthcare provider operating in Europe

new_visitors.description: Arrive from Google or marketing campaigns; want to verify DoktorABC's legitimacy and understand who is behind the service
new_visitors.goal: Build trust, understand the company's mission, and feel safe to purchase or start consultation

returning_customers.description: Existing patients who want to confirm the credibility of our doctors and operations
returning_customers.goal: Learn more about our regulatory framework, physicians, and global presence

press_partners.description: Journalists or potential business partners checking the brand's credibility and scale
press_partners.goal: Quickly identify the company's scope, certifications, and media mentions

requirements: Standard DoktorABC header with: Company logo, Cart, My Account, Hamburger menu
design_sections.notes: Same as across main site. Sticky at top

requirements: Title: 'Who We Are'

Text: 'DoktorABC is a trusted European telemedicine platform that connects patients, licensed physicians, and partner pharmacies to provide online consultations, prescriptions, and medicine delivery across Europe.'
Visual: Image of a doctor with patient, or pharmacy team
design_sections.notes: First fold must establish brand identity, professionalism, and tone of trust

requirements: Title: 'Our Mission'

Text: 'Our mission is to make healthcare accessible, affordable, and convenient via a fully digital platform that connects patients, licensed physicians, and pharmacies across Europe. We combine technology and clinical expertise to deliver healthcare conveniently, discreetly, and at scale.'
Graphic: Process line or small icons showing flow — Consult → Diagnosis → Prescription → Dispensing
design_sections.notes: Design should mirror the slide visual with a clean, medical layout

requirements: Title: 'Our Vision'
Text: 'To redefine the way people access healthcare — making high-quality medical treatment seamless, private, and personalized for everyone.'
design_sections.notes: Place after Mission for logical flow. Minimal visual needed

requirements: Title: 'Where We Operate'
Text: 'DoktorABC operates across Europe through licensed partners and physicians in Germany, France, and Switzerland, managed by Sky Marketing LTD in the UK and HelFy LTD in Israel.'
Map Visualization: Interactive or static map with flag regions
design_sections.notes: Use green brand markers on map (like presentation slide)

requirements: Title: 'How We Grow'
4 Data Blocks: '1M+ Customers Served', '40+ Types of Treatments', '50+ Partner Pharmacies', '100+ Employees', '7 years of trust'
Include Trustpilot rating (4.6 ★ from 13,000+ reviews) and Käuferschutz badge
design_sections.notes: Should visually match presentation 'How we grow' slide

requirements: Title: 'Meet Our Doctors'
Doctor Card Template (for each doctor): Doctor's photo, Full name and title, Country / Practice location, Short bio or specialization line
Regulatory authority: e.g., 'Entidade Reguladora da Saúde, Rua S. João de Brito, 621 L32, 4100-455 Porto, Portugal.'
Link text: 'Check the registration of the treating physicians here.'
design_sections.notes: Display 3-4 doctor cards per row, scrollable on mobile

requirements: Title: 'What Our Patients Say'
Content: Carousel or grid of 4-6 verified Trustpilot reviews with rating stars and review snippet
Include average rating (e.g., 4.6 / 5)
Title: 'As Seen In' or 'Our Press'
Logos carousel of media outlets that have featured DoktorABC
Logos: Yahoo Finance, Tagesspiegel, Nordbayern.de, OK! Magazin, Vital
design_sections.notes: Same press logo order and styling as homepage

requirements: Title: 'Our Certifications'

Include logos and short descriptions: LegitScript – certified for healthcare compliance, PCI Security Standards Council – secure coordination of data handling, DMCA Protected – content and brand protection, BIM Membership – ensuring regulatory and ethical compliance
Each certification includes 1-line description from the presentation
design_sections.notes: Display horizontally in logo row with small text below each

requirements: Title: 'Your Privacy & Payment Security'
Icons for accepted payment methods (PayPal, Visa, Mastercard, Klarna)
Include DoktorABC Data Privacy logo (GDPR compliance)
design_sections.notes: Compact visual design — trust-focused close to footer

requirements: Title: 'Start Your Treatment Today'
Button: 'View All Treatments' or 'Start Consultation'
design_sections.notes: Optional closing CTA to lead back to main conversion funnel

requirements: Standard DoktorABC footer with: Logo, Navigation links (About, Treatments, FAQ, Contact), Payment methods, Country flags, Company address & certifications, © 2025 DoktorABC.com, Disclaimer text
design_sections.notes: Must match global site structure and styling
